long_description: Built with high-performance fabrics and carefully designed features, the women's Sugoi RSR tights allow you to feel sleek, sharp and ready to test your limits during high-intensity exercise. Nylon, polyester and spandex blend create a smooth, comfortable texture that fits snugly and stretches with you as you move. Fabric also delivers lightweight coverage while actively wicking moisture and drying quickly for continual comfort. Articulated seams allow for natural, unrestricted motion and a lined, gusseted crotch enhances freedom of motion. Flat seams minimize chafing. 7 in. ankle zippers provide easy on-and-off over shoes. Zippered back pocket stores gels while on the go. Internal key pocket safely stows key, ID, credit card or small media player. The women's Sugoi RSR tights feature an elastic waistband with internal drawcord that lies flat against skin. Closeout.
short_description: Built with high-performance fabrics and carefully designed features, the women's Sugoi RSR tights allow you to feel sleek, sharp and ready to test your limits during high-intensity exercise.
